content: What is the address of the restaurant and time of the dinner? It would be nice to have it on the web page

Not an address but here is a Google Map link: https://www.google.com/maps/place/Silk+Elephant/@40.4375216,-79.9253108,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x8834f1ff6239ee53:0xb5fcd71089442272!8m2!3d40.4375175!4d-79.9231221?hl=en
I will be leaving the hotel at 630 and attempting to find my way there. Meet in the lobby at 630?

There is a link on the web page here:
http://www.andrew.cmu.edu/user/avigad/meetings/fomm2020/travel.html
Tonight I'll also add links to a map for Kevin's talk on Friday at the Frick Fine Arts library.
